item.title: Hilton guests will enjoy Live Nation experiences
item.description:
Hilton Worldwide and Live Nation, a live entertainment company, have launched a new five-year marketing partnership. This collaboration will provide unique experiences, including artist connections and concerts, to Hilton HHonors members, guests, and employees across Hilton’s global network of over 4,250 hotels. Source:Â Hilton Worldwide. Hilton aims to motivate a new, healthier way of thinking - urging individuals to embrace the unfamiliar, gain perspective, and learn from daily life and travel...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hilton-guests-will-enjoy-live-nation-experiences/
